body.name: Cordless Vacuum Cleaner, 450W/38KPA Cordless Vacuum with LED Display, 55Mins Runtime Lightweight & Ultra-Quiet Cordless Stick Vacuum for Carpet and Floor, Home, Pet Hair Cleaning
features: POWERFUL SUCTION - MarsVac S1 cordless vacuum cleaner maximum mode can reach 38KPa powerful suction power, which can instantly suck away dirt, debris, pet hair and stains, easy to clean hard floors, tile, carpets and hardwood floors. Clean quietly with less disturbance to family and pets.

All-in-ONE LED DISPLAY - Vacuum has Large smart LED display screen, you can effortlessly get the current status of your vacuum cleaner. It shows real-time suction mode, remaining battery value, and floor brush blockage reminder.

LONG-LASTING RUNTIME - Stick vacuum has a 2200mAh rechargeable battery, 4H fast charging, delivers up to 20(Max mode)-55(Eco mode) minutes uninterrupted run time depending on your mode, ideal for large jobs and full house cleaning.

ULTRA-LIGHTWEIGHT - The main body of the cordless vacuum is super lightweight at only 2.7lbs, perfect for one-handed cleaning, not make your hands feel tired even if you use it for a long time. The wall mount design making it easily to be stored and charged without taking up any space.

MULTI-FILTRATION SYSTEM - Cordless vacuum features a 7-stage cyclone dustproof structure that captures 99.99% of fine dust, captures even particles as small as 0.1 mm. and expels purified clean air. It‘s safe and friendly to families with babies, elders, and special-care members.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This ROANOW Vacuum does it all!! Efficient & user friendly too!
reviews.reviewText: This ROANOW Vacuum does it all!! Efficient & user friendly too! Very easy to assemble out of the box. Effective, versatile, lightweight, maneuverable, easy to clean and empty, nice features and beautiful blue color. Battery life seems great so far and love the extra suction power button. Definitely give this stick vacuum a shot for your next vacuum. #versatile

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent vacuum for light work at a great price
reviews.reviewText: This vacuum came packaged extremely well and assembly was simple and user friendly. It is very lightweight, yet all parts are sturdy and click together firmly. It has sufficient suction and brush power to handle all vacuuming tasks other than deep carpets and rugs. The light on the front is a nice bonus, as is its quietness. It converts to a hand-held vacuum easily, and is easy to clean with the one-click removeable dust-bin canister and rotating brush head. Battery life is good and is easily tracked via the digital dial on the handle. I recommend this product as an excellent all-in-one replacement for basic corded electric brooms, hand-held rechargeable Dust Buster-type vacuums, and conventional rechargeable battery-powered sweepers--it is more powerful, runs longer, and much easier to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This vacuum cleaner is a very good product as it does what we exactly needed to do in our house. First of all we appreciate how very lightweight it is, even our kids can easily use it. We love the fact that we can use it anywhere in the house without any restrictions, no more hassle on replugging cords. It has 2 modes of suction power and you can also see the percentage of its battery. The battery life was pretty decent, it can get a full clean of the first floor in our house in one go. And the good thing is that it charges fast. It’s good on carpet, hardwood and tiled floors. Great for quick little pick ups as well as on the stairs. It’s easy to put together, swivels easily, and very easy to empty the tank and clean the filter. Aside from all the features and its functionality it also comes with 3yrs warranty. We definitely recommend this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It’s a beast of a little vac, but battery life stinks
reviews.reviewText: It’s a good little vacuum. It works well on our hardwood floors. It is very easy to assemble, very lightweight, very maneuverable, easy to use, and compact (which allows for ease of storage). Its little headlights perform well and really help to see where the vacuuming is needed. It has good sucking power but the way the battery drains so quickly is a disappointment. Also, it took a couple hours to fully charge the battery. A bigger battery should be offered. I like the vac but the battery life leaves much to be desired.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Light and mighty!
reviews.reviewText: It was a long process of reading different reviews for different products, and I am glad I decided to go with Roanow stick vacuum! Very easy to put together. Light weight and GREAT suction! It has a light that really helps see better while vacuuming. It runs great, I used it twice so far on hardwood floors and the battery is nowhere near empty. It slides so nice under beds, sofas, etc. I used it mostly on hardwood floors, and a few entrance carpets, and it vacuums great on both surfaces! It’s so much easier now to run a vacuum quick and give the house a quick cleanup. I haven’t tried the attachments yet, but they will be very convenient for many different areas and uses. The only thing I’d change on it is the ON/OFF button. It sits just under your fingers while holding the unit and vacuuming, which makes you shut it off accidentally. But … it’s just a matter of getting used to it. Love it! Would buy again for sure.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the charge time!
reviews.reviewText: I’ve had this vacuum for a little while and wanted to leave a review!Pros:It keeps its charge well and when it dies it has a quick charge with a smaller amount of power (like a 25% charge in a couple minutes) so you can finish a job a little more easily than the big-name vacuums that take a long time to charge before you can use them again. The full charge takes longer, but I was impressed at the small amount of power that you get quickly.The filter shown above was VERY dirty and I spent about 10-15 minutes on turbo mode (because it needed a lot of work!) and it only used 30% of the battery. (The purifier filter is "stained" with dust in some areas since we let it go for a very long time without cleaning it, so the after might not look squeaky clean, but it is! The air feels so much cleaner now.) Also showing the lovely digital display!In my previous Shark vacuum, turbo mode had to be held down the entire time to be used. This vacuum only requires a single button press. It sounds like a small thing, but my hands fatigue easily, and it’s a really nice feature.Speaking of fatigued hands, this thing is LIGHT compared to the Shark. This vacuum is much easier to carry and maneuver despite having weak hands/wrists.It is quiet! Even on turbo, it doesn't bother my dog at all.I love the thoughtful touch of the additional filters and a special cleaning tool.The plug in charger is also small and lightweight, which is a nice change from the giant chargers from my last vacuum.It's visually streamlined and colorful and looks so expensive! My last vacuum cost almost twice as much as this one and didn't look nearly as nice. I wouldn't mind this one being on display as much.It did great with dog hair pickup too!It has a battery that comes off the unit so you don't have to charge it in the same place you store it! It makes charging so much less awkward. I'm curious if they sell replacement batteries, since it looks like you could probably swap them out (and always have one charged for infinite vacuum time! Lol).Cons:I wasn't able to test this vacuum on carpet since I only have hard floors with solid mats, so I can't speak to how well it works on carpet.My last vacuum was an expensive Shark, and in comparison, I felt that the suction was less in this vacuum. However, if I used it exclusively in turbo mode, it did a good job! The battery life is way better than the Shark (and infinitely better than the older 10-minute Dyson stick vacuum I had before that!), so if I have to take a little extra time I don't mind, since I still get further with this vacuum than with its predecessors before the battery dies.It is great for light daily cleanup. I still have my shop-vac for heavier messes which works out great. Brooms are hard for me because of difficulty bending down and this is much better.5 stars for daily cleanup on hard floors, looking expensive, the charge time and battery capacity, and that removable battery (especially if the company has extra batteries available for purchase - and if they don't, they totally should!).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I did alot of research before choosing this vacuum cleaner. I have mostly hardwood floors with area rug carpet and wanted something lightweight that would do the job. This vacuum cleaner fit the bill perfectly. Very easy to assemble, lightweight and the amount of charge was perfect for my 2 bedroom apartment. The suction was good and no dirt was left behind. I highly recommend this vacuum if you want something reliable, lightweight and effective.

reviews.reviewerName: elena celia gutierrez gonzalezelena celia gutierrez gonzalez
reviews.reviewText: Me gustó mucho la aspiradora aspira todo papel, todo cosa pequeñita

The media could not be loaded. After ordering this vacuum on Amazon, I received it in a couple of days. All the items in the box were well packed and nothing damaged. After charging the battery, I was able to clean two floors of the house with a single charge. Comes with a few attachments that allows you to use it for different types of cleaning. With two speeds, we use it not only for wood, ceramic and carpet floors but also for other items like furniture, cars, computer keyboards, window blinds, ventilation grills and lots more. The fact that the vacuum is light and very quiet and doesn’t tire you when using it for long period of time is a plus. It’s always ready to use for those quick cleanups, especially in the bathroom and kitchen. I like the design and blue color along with the display which gives you various information like battery status and which speed you’re using. Emptying the dust cup is quick and easy, just pressing the button of the vacuum cleaner over a garbage can, all the dirt comes out easily. The led light on the floor brush helps light up those dark areas of the house. The bracket to hang the vacuum has all the accessories you need all in one place. Makes you want to clean more often versus using other bigger and bulker vacuum cleaners. At this price, it’s a great purchase and would definitely recommend this Roanow Marsvac S1 cordless vacuum cleaner.

Buena aspiradora, la he comprado para aspirar el coche, buena potencia de succión, pesa poco y buena dirección de la batería.La batería se carga bastante rápido y he de decir que llevo varios meses usándola y hasta ahora no he tenido problemas.

Der Sauger wurde schnell geliefert und war sehr gut verpackt. Der Zusammenbau ist kinderleicht und das Gerät macht einen durchaus hochwertigen Eindruck. Er ist sehr leicht und wendig und man kann auch gut unter dem Sofa oder dem Bett saugen. Mit der Saugleistung bin ich sehr zufrieden. Tierhaare und normale Krümel werden im Ecomodus zuverlässig aufgenommen. Katzenstreukrümel sind mit dem einfach hinzuschaltbaren Turbo auch kein Problem. Mit der Beleuchtung vor der Bürste lassen sich Schmutz und Staub sehr gut erkennen. Die Akkuleistung ist bei Hartböden auch für grössere Wohnungen völlig ausreichend, wie es sich bei Teppichböden verhält kann ich nicht beurteilen. Ich habe nur ein grosses Kuhfell, aber auch dieses wird sehr gut von Staub und Krümeln befreit. Der Umbau zum Handsauger ist auch sehr simpel, genau wie das Entleeren des Schmutzbehälters. Auch die Reinigung desselben ist einach. Der Geräuschpegel ist angenehm. Ich habe das Gerät jetzt seit 6 Wochen in täglichem Betrieb und bin immer noch begeistert. Ich habe mir sogar vor kurzem noch ein zweites Gerät bestellt für die Oberwohnung. Preis/Leistung sind absolut top. Ganz klare Kaufempfehlung.

Aspirapolvere per auto portatile, ottima autonomia di durata, 2 potente di utilizzo, sono estremamente contento dell'acquisto, svolge il suo lavoro a pieni voti. Lo consiglio a tutti per chi vole tenere pulita la macchina e i sedili. Più accessori di utilizzo per diverse condizioni d'uso
